languages.text: "Увы, большая часть моих людей на станции погибла. У Инцендии было то, чего не мог дать людям я — провиант. Удивительно, сколь многие готовы переступить через клятвы верности в обмен на протеиновый брикет... и забыть о неизбежных последствиях". {n}Владайм жестко ухмыляется.{/n} "Что же, пересчитаем мое скромное воинство".

"Alas, most of my people on the station have perished. Incendia had what I couldn't offer — provisions. It's amazing how many people will break their oaths of loyalty for a nutribar... forgetting about the inevitable consequences." {n}Vladaym grins harshly.{/n} "Well then, let's give my modest fighting force a head count."
languages.original_text: "Увы, большая часть моих людей на станции погибла. У Инцендии было то, чего не мог дать людям я — провиант. Удивительно, сколь многие готовы переступить через клятвы верности в обмен на протеиновый брикет... и забыть о неизбежных последствиях". {n}Владайм жестко ухмыляется.{/n} "Что же, пересчитаем мое скромное воинство".

traits.locale_text: "Alas, most of my people at the station have perished. Incendia had what I couldn't offer. Provisions. It's amazing how many people will break their oaths of loyalty for a brick of protein... forgetting about the inevitable consequences." {n}Vladaym grins harshly.{/n} "Well then, let's give my modest fighting force a head count."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “很遗憾，我在舰站的绝大部分手下都死了。因森蒂娅拥有我无法提供的东西，那就是补给。没想到，居然会有那么多人为了几条营养条而违背自己的实验……却忘了不可避免的后果。”{n}弗拉迪姆狰狞地笑了起来。{/n}“好吧，来清点一下我为数不多的战士吧。”
languages.original_text: "Alas, most of my people on the station have perished. Incendia had what I couldn't offer — provisions. It's amazing how many people will break their oaths of loyalty for a nutribar... forgetting about the inevitable consequences." {n}Vladaym grins harshly.{/n} "Well then, let's give my modest fighting force a head count."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，我在舰站的绝大部分手下都死了。因森蒂娅拥有我无法提供的东西，那就是补给。没想到，居然会有那么多人为了几条营养条而违背自己的实验……却忘了不可避免的后果。”{n}弗拉迪姆狰狞地笑了起来。{/n}“好吧，来清点一下我为数不多的战士吧。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「残念なことに、ステーションの仲間のほとんどは死んでしまった。インセンディアは私が提供できなかったものを持っていた。食料だ。栄養バーの為に忠誠の誓いを破る人がどれだけいることか…その行為がどんな結果になろうとも、忘れてしまって」{n}ヴラダイムは厳しい笑顔を浮かべた。{/n}「それでは、私の数少ない戦士を数えようか」
languages.original_text: "Alas, most of my people on the station have perished. Incendia had what I couldn't offer — provisions. It's amazing how many people will break their oaths of loyalty for a nutribar... forgetting about the inevitable consequences." {n}Vladaym grins harshly.{/n} "Well then, let's give my modest fighting force a head count."

traits.locale_text: 「残念なことに、ステーションの仲間のほとんどは死んでしまった。インセンディアは私が提供できなかったものを持っていた。食料だ。栄養バーの為に忠誠の誓いを破る人がどれだけいることか…その行為がどんな結果になろうとも、忘れてしまって」{n}ヴラダイムは厳しい笑顔を浮かべた。{/n}「それでは、私の数少ない戦士を数えようか」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Desgraciadamente, la mayoría de mi gente en la estación ha fallecido. Incendia tenía lo que yo no podía ofrecer: provisiones. Es increíble cuanta gente romperá sus juramentos de lealtad por una barrita de nutrientes... olvidándose de las inevitables consecuencias». {n}Vladaym sonríe con crueldad.{/n} «Hagamos pues una demostración de mi modesta fuerza de combate».
languages.original_text: "Alas, most of my people on the station have perished. Incendia had what I couldn't offer — provisions. It's amazing how many people will break their oaths of loyalty for a nutribar... forgetting about the inevitable consequences." {n}Vladaym grins harshly.{/n} "Well then, let's give my modest fighting force a head count."

traits.locale_text: «Desgraciadamente, la mayoría de mi gente en la estación ha fallecido. Incendia tenía lo que yo no podía ofrecer: provisiones. Es increíble cuanta gente romperá sus juramentos de lealtad por una barrita de nutrientes... olvidándose de las inevitables consecuencias». {n}Vladaym sonríe con crueldad.{/n} «Hagamos pues una demostración de mi modesta fuerza de combate».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Leider sind die Meisten auf der Station gestorben. Incendia hatte, was ich nicht bieten konnte — Vorräte. Es ist erstaunlich, wie viele Leute bereit sind, ihren Treueschwur für einen Nutririegel zu brechen ... und die unvermeidlichen Konsequenzen zu ignorieren." {n}Vladaym grinst finster.{/n} "Nun, dann zählen wir meinen bescheidenen Kampftrupp mal durch."
languages.original_text: "Alas, most of my people on the station have perished. Incendia had what I couldn't offer — provisions. It's amazing how many people will break their oaths of loyalty for a nutribar... forgetting about the inevitable consequences." {n}Vladaym grins harshly.{/n} "Well then, let's give my modest fighting force a head count."

traits.locale_text: "Leider sind die Meisten auf der Station gestorben. Incendia hatte, was ich nicht bieten konnte — Vorräte. Es ist erstaunlich, wie viele Leute bereit sind, ihren Treueschwur für einen Nutririegel zu brechen ... und die unvermeidlichen Konsequenzen zu ignorieren." {n}Vladaym grinst finster.{/n} "Nun, dann zählen wir meinen bescheidenen Kampftrupp mal durch."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Hélas, la plupart de mes agents dans la station sont morts, Incendia ayant ce qui me manquait : des provisions. Il est étonnant de voir le nombre de gens capables de trahir leur serment de fidélité pour une nutribarre... en oubliant les inévitables conséquences, {n}dit-il avec un sourire sévère.{/n} Bref, recensons rapidement mes modestes forces. »
languages.original_text: "Alas, most of my people on the station have perished. Incendia had what I couldn't offer — provisions. It's amazing how many people will break their oaths of loyalty for a nutribar... forgetting about the inevitable consequences." {n}Vladaym grins harshly.{/n} "Well then, let's give my modest fighting force a head count."

traits.locale_text: « Hélas, la plupart de mes agents dans la station sont morts, Incendia ayant ce qui me manquait : des provisions. Il est étonnant de voir le nombre de gens capables de trahir leur serment de fidélité pour une nutribarre... en oubliant les inévitables conséquences, {n}dit-il avec un sourire sévère.{/n} Bref, recensons rapidement mes modestes forces. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ne var ki istasyondaki adamlarımın çoğu sizlere ömür. Bende olmayan erzaklar, İncendia'nın elinde mevcuttu. Bir besinbar için ne yeminler bozulduğunu bir görseniz... Kaçınılmaz sonlar birden unutuluyor." {n}Vladaym haşince sırıtıyor.{/n} "O vakit mütevazı kuvvetlerimin bir yoklamasını alalım."
languages.original_text: "Alas, most of my people on the station have perished. Incendia had what I couldn't offer — provisions. It's amazing how many people will break their oaths of loyalty for a nutribar... forgetting about the inevitable consequences." {n}Vladaym grins harshly.{/n} "Well then, let's give my modest fighting force a head count."

traits.locale_text: "Ne var ki istasyondaki adamlarımın çoğu sizlere ömür. Bende olmayan erzaklar İncendia'nın elinde mevcuttu. Bir besinbar için ne yeminler bozulduğunu bir görseniz... Kaçınılmaz sonlar birden unutuluyor." {n}Vladaym haşince sırıtıyor.{/n} "O vakit mütevazı kuvvetlerimin bir yoklamasını alalım."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
